name: TSUNDERE MILFIN
description:
TSUNDERE MILFIN is an unusual visual novel with economic clinker simulation gameplay, Match3 levels and dialogue with a cute Muslim woman :3
You've been interviewed for your dream job at the TSUNDERE MILFIN investment company, and now you have to win the love and respect of your strictly ladyboss Areesha.

You will find yourself in various difficult working situations: get stuck with Areesha in the elevator, slip on the wet floor, find a secret gift from a secret admirer and more! Can you cope with these incredibly difficult situations, while earning money! Areesha is a sweet Muslim girl who loves and honors the traditions of her religion. She is an excellent specialist in her field, but sometimes she is so lacking in attention...

♥Features♥:

  • Puzzles Match3 will help you connect with Areesha. She really likes this game. She will definitely be impressed with your skills.
  • Visual novel: learn more about working at TSUNDERE MILFIN, and of course get to know your cute Muslim colleague better :3
  • Humorous Office Situations: The game is set in a frantic office environment, with humor and unexpected situations that allow you to relax.
  • Character Development: The relationship between the player and his stern boss is central to the story, and the player's choice affects the development of their relationship.
  • Work-Conviction Balance: The game explores the idea of balancing the demands of work with personal beliefs and values, a topic that is both relatable and thought-provoking.
  • Smooth Live2d animations.
  • Animated cute backgrounds
  • Stunning soundtrack by the best lofi artists: G374, smth.nothing, Zephyr Deer, bluemoon.music, of4gatto_feelin, Meloxen, bluemoon.music, 09eleven ♥

Gameplay involves solving challenging match-3 puzzles that will help the player win the trust and respect of the boss.
TSUNDERE MILFIN offers a unique and engaging experience that combines match-3 puzzle gameplay, visual novel and office humor to create a one-of-a-kind game.

This game does not contain non-tolerance, any religious of any political organizations and anything like that. Only love and mutual understanding. Make Match3, not war ♥
